人活于世，苦痛永随，
身亡命殒，喜悦仍存。

人生并非孑然独立，
继往开来，连绵延续的道路才叫生命。

「总之就是这么一回事，拿去吧。
　算纪念品啦，纪念品。就算总有一天会忘却，
　这也能成为你曾做过这些事的纪念吧？
　如果你中意的话，就当做传家宝吧，
　可以向自己的孩子们好好炫耀炫耀。」

不仅为斩断宿业，
也是为了永远结下这段缘分。

「……话说回来，怎会如此。
　竟然把不会用上的东西做到极致，
　老夫也真是老了吧。」
profile.TW:
最終戰爭結束，
而後回歸日常。

日復一日、心有所屬、碰上變故、
建造居所、命懸一線。

雖然活著就會有痛苦的事情，
但即使死亡也會留下喜悅。

人生並非是單一的存在，
過去與未來，連綿延續的道路才叫生命。

「總之就是這麼一回事，拿去吧。
　紀念品啦，紀念品。就算總有一天會忘卻，
　這也能成為你曾做過這些事的紀念吧？
　如果你中意的話，就當做傳家寶吧，
　可以向自己的孩子們好好炫耀炫耀。」

不僅是為了斬斷宿業，
也是為了永遠結下這段緣分。

「……話說回來，這是怎樣。
　竟然把不會用上的東西做到極致，
　老夫也真是老了吧。」
profile.NA:
The battle eventually ended and he returned to his work.

He goes through his days, goes about his business, builds a home, loves, and gets involved in people's lives.

As long as one is alive, there is suffering. Yet even if one meets death, joy will live on.

Life is not a single point. It is a continuous path that connects the past to the future.

"Well there you have it. Take it. It's a keepsake, a souvenir. Even if we all are forgotten, it'll be a memento that everyone will see and know you did something great. Well, if you've taken a liking to it, make it a family heirloom and show it off to your kids or something."

Sometimes one doesn't need to sever karma, but rather to make enduring connections.

"Honestly. I can't believe I made something magnificent without intending that it be used. Maybe I'm going senile."
profile.KR:

命ある霊長が触れて無事でいられはしない。
景清がこれを取り出した際には、細心注意して、距離を取るべきだろう。

……もっとも。
義経としての存在がある限り、
マスターに危害が及ぶことはあるまい。
近頃は、景清自身も、
比較的に大人しくしているというし―――
profile.CN:
英灵·平景清的爱刀。宝具。
原本是平家代代相传的太刀。
平时伪装成二刀痣丸的形态，宝具真名解放时，恢复原本一把太刀的样子。

将怨念作为力量的存在，
是怨念聚集而成的存在。

但凡有生命的灵长类触碰到这个，是不可能平安无事的。
景清取出这个的时候，必须小心谨慎，与其保持距离才行。

……但是。
只要她体内还有身为义经的部分，
应该就不会危害到御主。
而且最近，景清本人也比较安分——
profile.TW:

profile.NA:
The beloved sword and Noble Phantasm of the Heroic Spirit, Taira-no-Kagekiyo. Originally a sword which was passed down through the generations of the Heike. Normally, it takes the temporary form of two swords called "Azamaru," but upon the Noble Phantasm's True Name revelation, it reverts back to its true form as a single long blade.

It is both powered by hatred, and exists as a physical amalgamation of that very loathing.

No living primate is safe from its touch. The moment Kagekiyo unsheathes this blade, you should proceed with extreme caution.

Although...as long as Yoshitsune is around, Master should not be in harm's way. Kagekiyo has even been relatively calm lately...
profile.KR:

원래는 헤이케 대대로 내려오는 태도.

취하지만, 보구의 진명 해방 시에는 본래의 모습인

원념을 힘으로 삼는 물건이며,

생명이 있는 영장이 건드리면 무사할 리 없다.
카게키요가 이것을 꺼냈을 때는,

……애초에.
요시츠네로서의 존재가 있는 한,

profile.JP:
―――鬼一法眼の高下駄、一足。

脱ぎっぱなしで無造作に転がっている。

あたりだろうと推察できる。
どうやら、よほど急ぎの用向きがあったらしい。
良くない話であれば一々下駄を脱いではいまいから、

上機嫌な師匠の顔が目に浮かぶ。
かんら、から、から！　と元気に笑うのだろう。
なんとも微笑ましく愛おしいけれど、
そろそろ急ごう。
急いで上がったはいいものの、屋敷に誰も
いないのでは流石の師匠もへそを曲げかねない。

「おーい、誰かいないか！」
ほら、声が聞こえてきた。
急ごう！
profile.CN:
——鬼一法眼的高齿屐，一双。

脱下的木屐被随意扔在地上。
可以推测出，
应该是「从中庭进入屋内时随手脱下的」。
看来，她一定有什么急事吧。
是什么坏消息的话，她应该没空脱什么木屐吧，
所以一定是什么好消息。

眼前仿佛浮现出师傅愉快的样子了。
她一定会嘎、嘎、嘎！地开朗欢笑吧。
虽然这景象会令人高兴而感到可爱，
但也该抓紧时间了。
一旦急匆匆进入屋子后发现房里一个人都没有，
即便是师傅，也可能会闹别扭吧。

「喂～，有人吗！」
你看，能听到声音了。
赶快！
profile.TW:
——鬼一法眼的高木屐，一雙。

可以推測出，

如果是壞消息的話，她應該沒空脫什麼木屐吧，

眼前彷彿浮現出師父愉快的樣子了。
她一定會嘎、嘎、嘎！地開懷大笑吧。

一旦急急忙忙進入屋子後發現房裡一個人都沒有，
即便是師父，也可能會鬧彆扭吧。

profile.NA:
A pair of Kiichi Hogen's takageta...elevated wooden clogs.

They're unceremoniously lying on the ground, likely kicked off when she came into the house from the courtyard. It seems the wearer was in quite the hurry. She wouldn't have bothered to remove them if bad news was what made her rush, so it must have been good news.

You can just imagine the great mentor of the East in a good mood. She'll be laughing merrily: "Kanra, kara kara!" While this is both a charming and adorable image, you need to hurry... If she rushed in only to find nobody inside the mansion, even the mild-mannered mentor may get cranky.

"Heeey, is anyone here!?"
Ah, do you hear her?
Let's hurry!
profile.KR:

정도로 추측할 수 있다.

좋지 않은 일이었다면 일일이 나막신을 벗지 않았을 테니,
분명히, 좋은 일이 틀림없다.

기분 좋은 스승님의 얼굴이 눈에 선하다.
껄껄, 껄껄! 하고 우렁차게 웃겠지.
정말 절로 미소 지어질 정도로 사랑스러운 모습이겠지만,

서둘러 들어왔는데 집 안에 아무도 없어서야,

“어이~ 아무도 없는 게냐!”
봐라, 목소리가 들리기 시작했다.
서두르자!

profile.JP:
彼女は何も残さなかった。
生まれつき自分の運命に客観的で、
病弱ゆえ生存する事自体が難しく、
どのような平穏であれ、
彼女にとって季節は常に冬だった。

だから、未練も無念も持つ事はなく。
己の役割を果たした後は
はじめからそうであったかのように、
“いないもの”として消え去るのがよいと、
本心から思っていた。

「ああ、でも―――
　この日射しは、とても善いものですね」

人が戻り、明日が戻り、世界が救われたその日。
瞼を閉じる間際、彼女は少しだけ、
今まで見なかったものを見た。

「明日になれば、きっと。
　輝くような毎日が」

その憧れを抱いたまま、彼女は深い眠りについた。
本来なら何も残さない筈の人生の証。
数少ない少女としての趣味であった思い出を、
得がたい友人に遺すように。
profile.CN:
她没有留下任何东西。
生来就对自己的命运非常客观，
由于病弱，生存本身就很艰难，
无论生活多么平静，
对她来说季节也始终是冬天。

所以，没有留恋或是遗憾。
当完成自己的职责之后，
犹如从一开始就该这样，
真心认为自己应该作为
“不存在之物”消失。

「啊啊，但是——
　这阳光，是多么美好啊。」

人们归来，明日归来，世界被拯救的那一天。
在阖上眼帘的瞬间，
她看到了一些以前从未见到的东西。

「从明天起，每一天，
　肯定都会无比闪耀吧。」

怀着这份憧憬，她陷入了沉睡。
这是她原本什么都不该剩下的人生的证明。
就像想将自己为数不多的少女兴趣的回忆
留给难能可贵的友人一样。

profile.NA:
She left nothing behind.

Speaking of the fate she was born with objectively, her weak constitution made it hard for her to survive, yet she remained calm no matter what, because to her, every season was winter.


That's why, she doesn't harbour any lingering affections or regrets.

From the bottom of her heart, she thought that it would be nice if she could vanish after she has accomplished her duty, as "something that that doesn't exist" like it was that way since the beginning.


"Ahh, but―――

The sunlight, it feels so nice."


That day was the day the world was saved, tomorrow returned, and the people brought back. 

Just before she closes her eyes, just for a little bit, the girl saw something that she has never seen before.

"If tomorrow comes, I'm sure that it would be shining every day."


She fell into a deep sleep wich such longing.

Originally, hers was the symbol of a human life that was supposed to leave nothing behind.

But now, she hopes she can bequeath the few memories that she liked to her scarce friends.
profile.KR:

 이 햇살은 참으로 좋네요.”

사람이 돌아오고, 내일이 돌아오고, 세계가 구원받은 그날.
눈을 감은 순간, 그녀는 잠시나마,
지금까지 보지 못했던 것을 보았다.

“내일이 되면, 분명히.
 반짝이는 듯한 매일이.”

그 동경을 품은 채, 그녀는 깊은 잠에 들었다.
본래라면 아무것도 남기지 못했을 인생의 증거.
몇 안 되는 소녀로서의 취미였던 추억을,
귀한 친구에게 남기는 것처럼.

profile.JP:
ボイジャーからのお返し。

カルデアを訪れ、ゆるやかにスイングバイする彼が
思うままに日常を切り取った記憶の断片。
まだアルバムにまとめられていない写真たち。


―――1990年２月14日。
宇宙探査機ボイジャーが撮影した39枚の写真群は
『太陽系家族写真　Ｆａｍｉｌｙ　Ｐｏｒｔｒａｉｔ』と呼ばれている。
それは地球から60億キロの彼方、
光の速度で５時間半かかる海王星軌道の外側から、
目を細めて太陽を振り返り、
よく親しんだ惑星たちの姿をレンズに捉え、
磁気テープ上のデジタルな情報としておさめられた。
「ペイル・ブルー・ドット」の通称を持つ
淡い地球の点描写真は、そのうちの一枚だ。

木星や土星、外惑星の近傍をかすめながら
数万枚もの撮影任務を果たしたボイジャーだったが、
当時の機体はごくわずかな記録容量しか持たず、
新たな撮影のたびに送信済みの情報は上書きされた。

しかしながら太陽系家族写真を最後に、それ以降、
ボイジャーは撮影の指令を受け取ることはなく、
他機器の電力確保のためカメラの電源もまた
永久的に落とされた。

それなら……もしかしたら、
今、彼が運び抱く記録テープには、
最後に太陽系の家族たちを写したデータがまだ、
かすかながら残されているのかもしれない―――。
profile.CN:
旅行者的回礼。

造访迦勒底，缓缓进行重力助推的他
随心所欲地从日常生活中截下的记忆碎片。
还没有被整理进相册的照片。


——1990年2月14日。
宇宙探测器旅行者拍摄的一组39张照片
被称作『太阳系全家福　Family Portrait』。
这是从距地球60亿公里的远方，
从用光的速度都要耗费五个半小时的海王星轨道外侧
眯起眼睛回望太阳，
用镜头捕捉熟悉行星们的形象，
并以数据情报的形式在磁带上保留下来的东西。
通称「暗淡蓝点」的暗淡地球的小点照片，
就是其中的一张。

旅行者从木星、土星等地外行星边擦过，
并完成了数万张照片的拍摄任务，
但当时的机体只有很小的记录容量，
每当拍摄新照片时，都会将已完成发送的数据覆盖。

但是，在拍摄了太阳系全家福之后，
旅行者再也没有接收到任何拍摄的指令，
为了确保其他设备的电力，
照相机的电源也被永久关闭了。

既然如此……说不定，
现在，他抱着带走的记录磁带中，
还残留着少许——
最后拍摄的太阳系家人们的照片数据吧。
profile.TW:
航海家的回禮。

造訪迦勒底，緩緩進行重力助推的他
隨心所欲地從日常生活中截下的記憶碎片。
還沒有被整理進相冊的照片。


——1990年2月14日。
宇宙探測器航海家拍攝的一組39張照片
被稱作『太陽系全家福　Family Portrait』。
這是從距地球60億公里的遠方，
從用光的速度都要耗費五個半小時的海王星軌道外側
眯起眼睛回望太陽，
用鏡頭捕捉熟悉行星們的形象，
並以數據情報的形式在磁帶上保留下來。
通稱「暗淡藍點（Pale Blue Dot）」，一個小點的暗淡地球的照片，
就是其中的一張。

航海家從木星、土星以及系外行星邊擦過，
並完成了數萬張照片的拍攝任務，
由於當時的機體只有很小的儲存容量，
每當拍攝新照片時，都會將已完成發送的資料覆蓋。

但是，在拍攝了太陽系全家福之後，
航海家再也沒有接收到任何拍攝的指令，
為了確保其他設備的電力，
照相機的電源也被永久關閉了。

既然如此……說不定，
現在，他攜帶的紀錄磁帶中，
還殘留著少許——
最後拍攝的太陽系家族的照片資料吧。
profile.NA:
Return gift from Voyager.


The fragments of memories cut off to his heart's content from the days that he leisurely swings by since his arrival to Chaldea.


The photos that he has yet to put into an album.


―――February 14, 1990.


The 39 photos that Space probe Voyager photographed is called "Family Portrait".


It was achieved by capturing the form of the planets that he was greatly intimated with in the lens, from outside Neptune's orbit, which is 6 billion kilometer and 5 hours and a half at the speed of light away from Earth, while squinting his eyes and looking back at the Sun, and then put down onto magnetism tape as digital information.


Among them is a pointillism photo of the faint Earth, commonly known as "Pale Blue Dot".


Voyager was suceeded in his photographing mission as he took tens of thousands of them while sweeping over the vicinity of Jupiter or Saturn, however, the machinery at the time has very little memory capacity, so the transmitted information would be overwritten with each new photographing.


However, after the last Family Portrait, Voyager did not receive any orders to take more photographs, and in order to secure power for other devices,the power for the camera was permanently turned off.


If that's the case......

Then perhaps, the recording tape he's carrying at the moment might still have some faint traces of the data he took of the last Solar system families left behind ―――.
profile.KR:
보이저에게 받은 답례.

칼데아를 방문해, 느긋하게 스윙바이하는 중인 그가
원하는 대로 일상을 잘라 만든 기억의 단편.
아직 앨범에 끼워 넣지 않은 사진들.

────1990년 2월 14일.
우주 탐사선 보이저가 촬영한 39장의 사진들은
‘태양계 가족 사진 Family Portrait’ 이라고 불린다.

그것은 지구에서 60억 킬로미터 떨어진 저편,
빛의 속도로 5시간 반이 걸리는 해왕성 궤도 외곽에서,
눈을 가늘게 뜨고 태양을 돌아보며,
친근한 행성들의 모습을 렌즈로 포착하고,
자기 테이프 상의 디지털 정보로서 담아냈다.
‘페일 블루 도트’라는 통칭이 붙은
희미한 지구의 점묘 사진이, 그중 하나다.

보이저는 목성과 토성, 외행성 근방을 스쳐 지나가며
수만 장의 촬영 임무를 달성했지만,
당시의 기체는 극히 적은 기록 용량밖에 없어서,
새로운 촬영을 할 때마다 송신을 끝낸 정보는 덧씌워졌다.

그렇지만 태양계 가족 사진을 마지막으로,
그 후에 보이저가 촬영 지령을 받는 일은 없었고,
다른 기기의 전원 확보를 위해서 
카메라 전원 역시 영구적으로 꺼졌다.

그렇다면…… 어쩌면,
지금, 그가 가지고 운반하는 기록 테이프에는,
마지막에 태양계의 가족들을 찍은 데이터가 아직,
희미하게나마 남아 있을지도 모른다────

profile.JP:
鬼女紅葉からのバレンタインチョコ。

『ＧＹＡＯＯＯＮＮ！！　ダイノワーイフ！！
　悠久の時を超えこの“ばれんたいん”に新登場じゃ！
　大きなちょこの塊から、はんまーとぶらしを駆使して
　大胆かつ丁寧に掘り出すがよい！
　しいくれっとは四百万年前の戸隠山を闊歩しておった
　すてごどん・しんしゅえんしす、じゃ！』

profile.JP:
虞美人（ランサー）からのバレンタインチョコ。

結婚報告の葉書のように、幸せを手に入れたことを関係者に一応報告するためのもの……らしい。

彼女の弁によれば微笑・睥睨・怒り・眠り・見つめ合い・演算中……などの「項羽様のドキッとする素敵な表情セレクション」で一枚ごとに項羽の顔は違うようだが、見分けるのは非常に難しい。
なお食べる際にも作法があるらしく、下手に二人の姿を壊したりすると怒られる。
真ん中で割ったりするのは一番の大罪。死あるのみ。

……つまり、非常に食べにくい。
profile.CN:
雏罂（枪兵）赠予的情人节巧克力。

就像为了表现夏天的兴奋一样，公然画着她与自己最爱的存在并排站在一起的漫画形象的心形巧克力。
就像结婚通知的信函，仿佛想要将自己获得幸福的事……姑且通知给相关人员的存在。

根据她的解释，上面印的分别是微笑、睥睨、愤怒、沉睡、相互凝视、演算中……等「重瞳大人令人心动的美妙表情精选集」，每块上的重瞳表情好像都不同，但非常难以分辨。
另外品尝的时候似乎要讲究规矩，一旦不小心破坏了两人的形象，就会遭她训斥。
从正中一分为二是最大的禁忌，该当死罪。

……也就是说，吃起来难度很高。

profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Consort Yu (Lancer).


Heart-shaped chocolates magnificantly depicting her together with her most beloved existence in a comicalized style to show how she has a lot of fun in summer.

profile.KR:
우미인(랜서)에게 받은 발렌타인 초콜릿.

여름의 들뜬 분위기를 드러내는 듯, 
그녀가 가장 사랑하는 존재와 나란히 선 모습이 
데포르메 형식임에도 당당하게 그려져 있는 
하트 형태의 초콜릿.

결혼을 알리는 청첩장처럼, 행복을 손에 넣었음을 
관계자들에게 일단 보고하기 위한 것…… 인 듯하다.

그녀의 말에 따르면 미소・노려봄・분노・수면・
마주보기・연산 중…… 등등 ‘심쿵하게 만드는 항우 님의 
근사한 표정 셀렉션’으로 각 초콜릿마다 항우의 표정이 
다르다고 하는데, 구별하기는 몹시 어렵다.

게다가 먹을 때도 예절이 있는지, 
섣불리 두 사람 함께 있는 구도를 무너트리면 야단맞는다.

가운데를 똑 부러트리는 것은 가장 큰 대죄. 
죽음만이 있을 뿐.

……즉, 무척 먹기 불편하다.

profile.JP:
卑弥呼からのバレンタイン埴輪チョコ。

あの伝説の邪馬台国初代女王が手ずからこねた埴輪型チョコとかいう奇跡の逸品。時代的に埴輪って古墳時代じゃない？　とか突っ込まれても弥生時代後期はギリセーフ扱いっていう女王の託宣も出てますので。

埴輪集めと鏡集めぐらいしか生前の趣味がなかった（失礼しちゃうわね！）女王だけに、その埴輪審美眼スキルはＡ＋レベルという日本史上稀に見るものと言って差し支えないものであり、おかげで自らがこねる埴輪造形力もわりと愛嬌あるレベルに達している。謎の光属性の波動も出ており健康にいい気もするわね！

―――幼い頃、とある姉弟は共に土をこねて笑いあっていたという。そう、彼女にとってはとても大事な人に贈る手作りのチョコレート。
profile.CN:
卑弥呼赠予的情人节埴轮巧克力。

虽然女王生前的兴趣只有搜集埴轮和搜集镜子（这话太失礼了吧！），但就算说她的埴轮审美技能达到了日本史上稀世罕见的A+阶级也不为过，以至于她本人捏制埴轮的塑造能力也能达到可爱的水准。还会释放迷之光属性的波动，感觉有利于健康！

——据说有对姐弟年幼时期总是边捏玩泥巴边一起大笑。没错，对她来说，这是赠与重要之人的手工巧克力。

profile.JP:
織田信勝からの贈り物。

その姉弟は同じ血を分けた一族でありながら、あまりにも違いすぎて、そしてあまりにも遠すぎた。少なくとも弟である自分にはそう思えた。

ただ、斯様に遠き姉が唯一その自分のやりようを褒めてくれたのがこの百舌鳥を使った狩りであった。

―――とても、とてもうれしかった。

姉にとっては余興のごとき戯言であったとしても、姉の目に留まる何かが自分にもあったのだと思うことが出来たのだから。

そう、これは何もない自分が貴方に応えることが出来るかもしれないという小さな証。

但距自己如此遥远的姐姐唯一夸奖自己的事，就是使用这伯劳鸟进行狩猎。

即便对姐姐来说，那只是犹如余兴的玩笑话，也说明了自己能做一些让姐姐留意的事了。

没错，这是一无所有的自己或许能够回应你的小小证明。

profile.NA:
A gift from Nobunaga Nobuyuki.


While the sister and brother share the same blood of a family, they are far too different, and also far too distant. At least, that's what the younger brother himself thought.


However, the only time that distant sister gave him praise for his way of doing things was when he hunted using this shrike.


―――He was so, so very happy.


Even if it's just silly talks which are like entertainments to his sister, he still could think of himself as having something that catches his sister's attention.


That's right, it's the small proof of the fact that maybe even the worthless me could do something to meet your expectation.

profile.JP:
ヴリトラからのバレンタインチョコ。

一度口にすればその甘さで脳髄まで痺れ、多幸感が全身を駆け巡り、もっともっと食べたいと涎が止まらなくなる魔的なまでに美味なるチョコ……なのだが、それは彼女謹製のからくり箱（細工箱）に包まれている。

人間が知恵と力の限りを尽くさなければ絶対に開けられない、しかし真摯に懸命に全身全霊をもって努力すれば開けられる、かもしれない……という絶妙な難易度バランスで設定されたその箱はもちろん彼女の堰界竜としての能力で作られたものであり、外部からの力で破壊することは不可能。

通常の魔術的・科学的スキャンは効かないうえ、解析系の宝具などを用いて強引に解法を一足飛びに得ようとすると、中のチョコが融解する仕組みになっている。

「き、ひ、ひ。楽をしようとするでない。
　もっと無様に足掻き、乗り越える様を見せよ。

profile.NA:
Valentine's chocolate from Vritra.

Unless humans exhaust the limit of their wisdom and might, they would never be able to open it, however, if they work hard, and seriously and earnestly devote all their body and soul, they can open it, maybe...... As this box is something created by her, the Dragon of Confined Boundary, ability, it is set at the miraculous most difficult balance, and outside forces would not be able to destroy it.

profile.KR:
브리트라에게 받은 발렌타인 초콜릿.

한번 입에 대면 그 달콤함에 뇌수까지 마비되고, 
행복감이 전신을 휩쓸며, 계속 먹고 싶어져서 
침이 멈추지 않는 악마적으로 맛있는 초콜릿…… 이지만, 
그것은 그녀가 직접 만든 세공 상자(상자 퍼즐)에 담겨 있다.

인간이 지혜와 힘을 한계까지 쏟아붓지 않으면 절대 
열리지 않는, 그렇지만 진지하고 필사적으로 몸과 마음을 
다해 노력하면 열릴 지도 모른다…… 라는 절묘한 
난이도 밸런스가 설정된 그 상자는, 
물론 그녀의 언계룡으로서의 능력으로 만들어진 것이며, 
외부의 힘으로 파괴하는 것을 불가능하다.

통상적인 마술적・과학적 스캔은 통하지 않는 데다, 
해석 계열 보구 등을 이용한 편법을 동원해 풀이법을 
얻으려고 하면, 안에 있는 초콜릿은 융해되도록 
설계되어 있다.

“키, 히, 히. 편하게 해결하려고 하지 마라.
 더 꼴사납게 발버둥 치고, 극복하는 모습을 보이거라.
 초콜릿을 선물하면 답례를 받을 수 있지 않느냐?
 나는 무엇보다도 달콤한 그것을 
 선불로 받으려고 할 뿐인 게야. 
 자, 힘내라~ 힘내라~……
 맛있는 초콜릿이, 바로 코앞에 있잖느냐?”

Stacked wafers that look like they are rising to the heavens.

profile.JP:
伝統ある魔術師の家系。
その身に宿した才と「宝石」級の魔眼。
両親の期待と家系の宿痾。
私の世界を覆う、灰色の全て。

濡れそぼり、熱を失った身体に芽生える感情など、
暗然たるもの以外に何があるのだろう。

雨粒の重しで頭を垂れる花のように俯く他に、
一体何ができるというのだろう。

決して触れることができない空に手を伸ばすのは、
無意味なことだと―――
そう、思っていたのに。

空に綺麗な虹を架けた英雄がいた。
空からの厄災を退けた英雄がいた。

―――空の先の世界をたった一人で目指した人がいた。

厚い雨雲を越えれば、明るい世界が待っているのだと。
そんなことを笑顔で言う人たちが、此処にはいた。
profile.CN:
具有传统的魔术师家系。
身怀的才华与「宝石」级魔眼。
双亲的期待与家族的宿痾。
都是笼罩着我这世界的灰色。

浑身湿透，失去热量的身体里萌生的情感，
除了黯然以外还能有什么呢。

除了像被沉重的雨滴压到垂头丧气的花朵般俯首以外，
我究竟还能做什么呢。

向绝不可能触碰到的天空伸手，
是毫无意义的——
我曾经，这样认为。

可是，曾有位英雄在天空架起了美丽的彩虹。
可是，曾有位英雄击退了自天空而来的灾厄。

——曾有位人物独自一人向着天空尽头的世界前进。

这里，曾有几个人面带笑容说过，
只要穿过厚重的乌云，一定能看到明亮的世界。
profile.TW:
具有傳統的魔術師家系。
身懷的才華與「寶石」級魔眼。
雙親的期待與家族的宿疾。
全都是籠罩著我這世界的灰色。

渾身溼透，失去熱量的身體裡萌生的情感，
除了黯然以外還能有什麼呢。

除了像被沉重的雨滴壓到垂頭喪氣的花朵般俯首以外，
我究竟還能做什麼呢。

向絕不可能觸碰到的天空伸出手，
是毫無意義的——
我曾經，這樣認為。

可是，曾有位英雄在天空架起了美麗的彩虹。
可是，曾有位英雄擊退了從天空降下的災厄。

——曾經有個人，獨自向著天空盡頭的世界前進。

profile.NA:
A long-established mage lineage.

The talent and “Jewel”-rank Mystic Eye contained within my body.

The expectation of my parents and the chronic disease in my family lineage.

My whole world is covered in an ashen colour.


There must be something else aside from the gloomy things, such as the feelings sprouting out from my body that was drenched to the bones and losing heat, right?


Besides hanging my head like a flower sagging under the weight of the raindrops, there must be something that I could do, right?


I thought that it’s meaningless to reach out my hand to the untouchable sky───

Yes, that’s what I had thought.


But, there was a hero who put up a beautiful rainbow in the sky.

There was a hero who removed the calamity from the sky.


───There was a person who aimed for a world beyond the sky all by himself.


Telling me that if I go beyond the thick rain cloud, a bright world is waiting.

People who would say that kind of thing with a smile, they were here.

profile.JP:
とある商店街の喫茶店では、

profile.JP:

欧州各地で起きているという連続怪盗事件。

侦探的脑海中顿时浮现出曾在远东感受过的那种厌恶感。本应消失在海中的男人身影。

profile.NA:
“It seems the thing called shadow of trouble would not disappear from my destiny.”

profile.JP:
サッカーの強さがすべての世界。
そんな中、新時代への道を切り開くはずの少年たちの前に突如として現れたのは不穏が服を着たような謎の男。

「この程度の荒波、穿てないほどヤワじゃないさ」
「ごめんね。ぼくは、とめるよ」
「姉上以外が天から見下ろしていいわけないだろ！」

人の“強さ”を嘲笑うかのように張り巡らされる数多の謀略と、送り込まれる刺客（シード）たちとの試合。
少年たちは勝ち進むことができるのか！

「ンンンンン！　いや是は実に興味深い……
  ヒトごときがよもや―――
  よもや我が企てを超えられるとでも？」

炸裂する無数の必殺バビロンシュート、
ジェット宇宙飛行スイングバイドリブル、
本能寺が如く燃え盛る自爆フィールド、
謎の妨害を行う邪神たち、
それは最早、世紀末といっても過言ではなく。



観客は沸き立ちながらもふと思う。
「サッカーしてなくない？」
profile.CN:
在足球实力代表了一切的世界。
在这个世界中，在本应开辟新时代道路的少年们的面前，突然出现了一名身着危险服饰的迷之男子。

「我还没软弱到这种程度的风浪都突破不了。」
「对不起。我，会挡住你哦。」
「除了姐姐大人以外，没有人可以居高临下的俯视！」

仿佛为嘲笑人类之“强大”而布下的众多策略，以及与被派来的刺客（种子选手）们之间发生的较量。
少年们是否能继续挺进呢！

「唔唔唔唔唔！　哎呀这还真有意思……
  区区人类难道——
  难道还能超越吾之企图吗？」

迸发的无数必杀巴比伦射门、
喷射宇宙飞行重力助推盘球、
如本能寺般熊熊燃烧的自爆场地、
以及进行谜之干扰的邪神们。
就算将这称作世纪末也毫不为过。



当观众们为之沸腾的同时也会突然这么想。
「这已经不是什么足球了吧？」
profile.TW:
在足球實力代表了一切的世界。

少年們是否能繼續挺進呢！

爆發的無數必殺巴比倫射門、

就算將這稱作世紀末也毫不為過。



當觀眾們為之沸騰的同時也會突然這麼想。
「這已經不是什麼足球了吧？」

The likes of human beings, could they―――

Violent exploding innumerable deadly Babylon Shoot, Jet Spaceflight, Swing-by Dribble, the self-destructed field burns like Honnouji, the mysterious evil gods who bring about disturbance, it is not an exaggeration to say this is the end of the century.



The audience, while excited, suddenly thinks. 

“They are playing soccer, right?”

profile.JP:
穏やかで温かな海風。
それに乗って訪れる鳥たちの囀り。
豊かな恵みを与えられた大地、枝葉を揺らす緑の木々。
寄せては返す波に運ばれて、海岸の白泡は美しく踊る。

作業場の窓から、いつも見えていた。
それら全てを、優しき鑿（のみ）の音が包んでいた。

ふと、疑問に思う。

この記憶の中の自分は、人だったのか。
それとも、彫像だったのか？

どちらでもよかった。
どうあれ、自分の幸福の全てはそこにあったのだから。
いつも、温かく、安心できて、満ち足りた何かに包まれていた。

それは彼の愛。
そして―――きっと、自分たちを見守る、美しき女神のまなざし。

その感覚は今も失われていない。
だからこそ、目を閉じるだけで思い出せるのだ。

キプロスの記憶は、どこまでも麗しく。
今この瞬間も、自分の中に息づいている。
profile.CN:
缓和温暖的海风。
乘着海风来访的鸟儿们的鸣啭。
被赐予了丰饶恩惠的大地，枝叶摇曳的翠绿树木。
在起起落落的海浪推送下，海岸边的白色浪花美丽地起舞。

总是透过工作室的窗口看着这些。
而这一切，都在温柔雕刻声的包裹之下。

突然，心生疑问。

这段记忆中的自己，是人吗。
还是雕像呢？

不管哪种都无妨。
因为无论如何，自己的所有幸福都在那里。
总是被温暖、令人安心、令人满足的某种存在所包围。

那就是他的爱。
同时——也一定是守护我们的美丽女神的目光。

现在仍未失去这种感觉。
正因为如此，只要闭上眼睛就能回忆起。

塞浦路斯的记忆无比美丽。
即便此时此刻，也在活在自己的身体中。

profile.NA:
The gentle and warm sea breeze.

The chirping of the birds riding along those winds to visit.

The land was given abundant blessing, and the green trees' branches and leaves swayed.

Carried by the waves that come and go, the white foam of the beach danced beautifully.


I was always looking at them from the workshop’s window.

Wrapping all around those things was (nothing but) the gentle sound of the chisel.


Suddenly, I started to wonder.


In that memory, was I human? 

Or was I a sculpture?


It didn’t matter which.

Because whichever I was, everything that made me happy was there.

I was always surrounded by something that was warm, relieving, and satisfying.


That thing was his love.

And ―――The beautiful Goddess’ gaze that no doubt was watching over us.


That feeling, even now, still isn’t gone.

That’s why, just by closing my eyes, I could remember it.


My memory of Cyprus is, forever beautiful, and even at this very moment, living within me.

万一……。
不！

肯定，肯定没问题。

Take a pen in my hand―――

I’ve thought of a really good idea.

But, what should I do?

I’m so nervous.


What if, it gets rejected?

What if, it doesn’t turn out good?

What if......

Non!

I’m sure it’s going to be okay, very sure.

I exit the atelier and saw you from behind.

I call out to you gracefully and give you my greetings.

profile.JP:
いつだって自分の歩く先は夜の闇だった。

魔術師としての才覚は並程度、家柄も平凡で、
やっと見出せたマスター適性の高さを活かす機会は、
棺の中で虚空に消えた。

あるのはただ、
何かを成せるはずだったという、後悔だけ。

それでも。あの世界の夜には光があった。
陽の光ほど強くはなく、月の光ほど優しくもない、
夜に降る雪のような、幽かな光。

だから、生きなければならない。
奮い立て。膝を折るな。何度でも立ち上がれ。
数え切れないほどの後悔を抱えていても、前を向け。

このカドック・ゼムルプスは、
もう無くなってしまったあの世界で、
雪花のように消えてしまった彼女にとって、
ただ一人のマスターなのだから。
profile.CN:
自己前行的方向始终都是漆黑一片。

身为魔术师的才华普普通通，出身也十分平凡，
好不容易找到的可以充分运用高御主适性的机会，
却在棺椁中消失于虚空。

剩下的只有，
本可以做到什么却未能实现的后悔。

即便如此，那个世界的夜晚依然有光。
不像阳光那么强烈，也不像月光那么柔和，
犹如夜晚降下的雪那样，散发着幽幽的光芒。

所以，必须活下去。
毅然起立，不能屈服，无论倒下多少次，都要站起身。
即便怀着无数的后悔，也要面向前方。

因为在那已然不存在了的世界中，
对于如雪花般消失的她来说，
我卡多克·泽姆露普斯，
是她唯一的御主。
profile.NA:
The path I walk has always been in the dark of night.


My talent as a mage is average, my family lineage is also unremarkable, and the opportunity to put my aptitude to be a Master, which was finally discovered, to good use disappeared into the void of the coffin.


The only thing I have is simply the regret that I should have been able to become something.


Even so. There was light within the darkness of my world.

It is not as strong as the sun light, nor as gentle as the moon light, just a faint light, like the snow falling at night.


That’s why I must live.

Pull yourself together. Do not fall down on your knees. Rise, no matter how many times you must.

No matter how numerous regrets you hold, move forward.


Because to the girl who has disappeared like a snow flower in that world that no longer existed, this Kadoc Zemlupus is the only Master.

profile.JP:
それは湖の妖精に与えられた、
何よりも尊く、輝かしいもの。

星の内海で生まれ、
地上に流れ着いた妖精にのみ与えられた、
世界を造る大母の証。
楽園の使命に従ってさえいれば、
いずれ星の魂として迎えられる、精霊の到達点。

―――けれど。
それは自分の願いではないと、
約束された栄光を捨て去った。

味方を癒やす杖は敵を倒す槍に変わった。

代わりに得たものは白亜の玉座。
彼女が願い続けた、ブリテンの物語。

profile.CN:

无比尊贵、闪耀的存在。

……但是，现在仍会想起。

是被丢弃在温柔石之宝座上的，逝去之梦的代价。
profile.NA:
It’s the most precious and glorious thing that has been given to her by the faerie of the lake.


The symbol of the Great Mother who built this world, only given to faeries who were born in the bay of the stars, and washed ashore to Earth.

As long as they comply with the duty of paradise, they would eventually be able to become the spirits of the stars, that is the ultimate goals of the faeries.


―――However.

She abandoned the promised glory, saying that it was not her own desire.


The wand that heals her allies changed into the spear that brings down her enemies.

The light in her eyes that she was born with was lost in battles.

At the end of her long journey, she has lost a great many things.


What she got was a throne of white wall instead.

The legend of Britain that she kept wishing for.


......Yet, even now, she still remembers.

The beloved old days at the land at the furthest end.

The price of a bygone dream left behind in a gentle throne of stone.

profile.JP:
それは黒犬公のひそかな趣味。

　……とはいえ、

profile.CN:

「毕竟有伴侣，做这些不是很正常嘛。

仿佛只要重要的人能来厨房看一下情况……
就足够幸福的样子。

这就是所谓的爱妻料理。
不过对人类来说，尺寸或许有些太大了？
profile.NA:
This is the secret hobby of Sir Black Dog.

On her days off, she spends all the afternoon cooking her specialty menu as well as cooking up new dishes.


“It’s a matter of course, as you can see, I have gained a partner.

......That said, I won’t force you to do the same thing.

This is just what I like to do, that’s all.”


Sir Black Dog has a satisfied smile on face as she says that.

As if to say that she would feel happy as long as an important person has come to see the state of her kitchen......


They are the so-called beloved wife dishes.

But hold up a minute, I think the portion might be too big for a human?

profile.JP:
「服とか家とか、料理とか。
　そこまでは分かるの。うん、分かる。
　妖精でもそれくらいはやるからな。
　でも履きものまで工夫するとか、もう無理。
　マジ無理。意識飛ぶ。
　だって足よ？　踵よ？
　いちばん敏感なところを思う存分飾るのよ？
　ダイタン、カレイ、ヨウエン、ユウガ。
　汎人類史にはもう魔法はないって聞いたけど、
　節穴もいいところ。こんなに沢山の魔法の靴、
　妖精國でもお目にかかれない。
　見るのも履くのも飾るのもいいけれど、
　夢はやっぱり自分の一足。
　少しずつ少しずつ、腕を上げて一流に近づくの。
　理想の靴ができるまで何年かかると思う？
　１年？　それとも10年？
　それまで私が生きていれば、
　その時は、記念に一足、貰ってくれる？」
profile.CN:
「衣服、房子、料理什么的。
　这些我还是知道的。嗯，我知道。
　因为即便是妖精，也是会做这些事的。
　但连脚上穿的东西也要自己花工夫什么的，实在是做不到。
　真的做不到，快晕倒了。
　因为那是脚哦？　是脚后跟哦？
　是要彻底打扮最敏感的部位哦？
　大胆、华丽、妖艳、优雅。
　听说泛人类史已经没有魔法了，
　这看法太有眼无珠了。那么多魔法鞋，
　连妖精国都见不到啊。
　可以看、可以穿、可以拿来当摆设，
　但我的梦想当然还是自己做一双。
　一点一点提升技术接近一流。
　你觉得要做出理想的鞋子需要花费多少年？
　1年？　还是10年？
　届时，只要我还活着，
　到那时，你愿意收下一双作为纪念吗？」
profile.NA:
“Things like clothes, houses, or food.

I understand that much. Yes, I do.

Even those kinds of things are popular with the faeries, after all.

But, I can’t even with figuring out these shoe things.

Seriously I give up. My consciousness is leaving me.

It’s feet we’re talking about here? Them heels, you know?

You can decorate your most sensitive place to your heart’s content, you know? 

Bold, gorgeous, captivating, and elegant.

I have heard that there is no more magic in the Pan-Human History, but the peepholes finally became useful here.

I have never even seen this many magic shoes in the faerie realm.

They are nice to look at, wear, or decorate, but my dream is really to have my own pair of shoes.

Little by little, little by little, raise my skills and get closer to the first-class.

How many years do you think it would take to make my ideal shoes?

1 year? Or maybe 10 years?

If I’m still alive by then, at that time, please get me a pair of shoes in celebration?”

profile.JP:
どれほど醜悪な在り方でも、
どれほど害悪な生き方でも、
あの日見た価値は変わらない。

46億年の記憶より眩しかった気まぐれな奇跡。
僕／私が見た、地上でもっとも美しいもの。

この体が崩れても、この心が砕けても、
憧れは無くならない。

麗しのオーロラ。
輝ける星のかんばせ。
永遠に変わらない愛を、ここに。
profile.CN:
无论存在方式多么丑陋，
无论生存方式多么危险，
也不会改变那天见到的价值。

比46亿年的记忆更为炫目的反复无常的奇迹。
在下／我见证的地表最为美丽的存在。

即便躯体崩溃，心灵粉碎，
这份憧憬也不会消失。

美丽的极光（欧若拉）。
闪耀星辰的容颜。
永恒不变的爱，在此。
profile.NA:
No matter how hideous of a being I am, no matter how evil my way of living is, the worthiness that I saw that day does not change.


A whimsical miracle that was more radiant than the memories of 4,6 billion years.

It was the most beautiful thing that I have seen on earth.


Even if my body was to shatter, even if my heart was to break into pieces, I will never stop yearning for it.

For the beautiful aurora.

For the visage of the shining stars.

For a forever unchanging love, at this place.

profile.JP:
本来この聖槍は、
しかるべき場所に納められるべきモノだ。
如何に栄光たる円卓の一席を担う身であるとはいえ、
本来、一騎士が所有するものではない。

けれど人理は……
この私の宝具として聖槍を定めた。
ロンギヌスを。
それ程までに、迫る危機は大きいのかもしれない。

ならば私は応えよう。
聖槍を携え、戦場の最前に立とう。
―――マスター、貴方と共に。
profile.CN:
这把圣枪，
原本应该被存放在合适的场所。
即便自己是身负光荣的圆桌骑士一席之身，
这也不是一介骑士该拥有的东西。

但是人理……
选中这把圣枪——
选中朗基努斯作为我的宝具。
或许迫近的危机已经巨大到如此程度了吧。

既然如此，那我就该回应。
携起圣枪，屹立于战场的最前线。
——御主，与您一起。
profile.NA:
By nature, this Holy Lance is something that should be kept in an appropriate place.

It is not something to be owned by a single knight, even if that person holds a seat in the glorious Round Table.


However, the Human Order has......made the Holy Lance my Noble Phantasm.

The Longinus, to someone like me.

To go as far as this, the approaching crisis must be significant.


Then, I shall respond to that.

I shall take up the Holy Lance, and stand on the front line of battles.

―――Together with you, Master.

profile.JP:
七つの特異点での戦いを遂行し、
ついに聖杯探索（グランドオーダー）の最終地点―――
終局特異点、冠位時間神殿ソロモンへと到達した
人理継続保障機関・カルデア。

全ての元凶である魔術王ソロモンを倒し、
未来を取り戻す。
そのときを間近に控えた一行は、
それぞれの時間を過ごしていた。

これまでに得た多くの出会い、
そして多くの未来を賭け、
藤丸とマシュはついに最後の作戦へと赴く……。
profile.CN:
完成了七个特异点的战斗，
人理续存保障机构·迦勒底
终于到达了圣杯探索（冠位指定）的最终地点——
终局特异点，冠位时间神殿所罗门。

打倒一切的元凶魔神王所罗门，
夺回未来。
即将面对这一时刻的一行人
分别经历了各自的时间。

赌上迄今为止的众多邂逅，
以及众多未来，
藤丸与玛修终于要开始最后的作战了……
profile.TW:
完成了七個特異點的戰鬥，
人理續存保障機構．迦勒底
終於到達了聖杯探索（冠位指定）的最終地點——
終局特異點，冠位時間神殿所羅門。

打倒一切的元凶魔神王所羅門，
奪回未來。

profile.NA:
After battling their way through all seven Singularities, the Chaldea Security Organization has finally arrived at the endpoint of the Grand Order: The Final Singularity, Grand Temple of Time: Solomon.

Now is the time to defeat the root of all evil, Solomon, the King of Mages. Now is the time to reclaim the future.

profile.KR:
7개의 특이점에서의 싸움을 마치고,
드디어 성배탐색(그랜드 오더)의 최종지점───
종국특이점, 관위시간신전 솔로몬에 도달한
인리계속보장기관 칼데아.

모든 원흉인 마술왕 솔로몬을 쓰러뜨리고,
미래를 되찾는다.
그 순간을 눈앞에 둔 그들은, 각자의 시간을 보낸다.

지금까지의 수많은 만남,
그리고 수많은 미래를 걸고,
후지마루와 마슈는 드디어 최후의 작전으로 향한다.

profile.JP:
ノウム・カルデアに（いつの間にか）存在する偉大なるライブラリー。
その成立の経緯はどうあれ、知の宝庫としては申し分無く、古今東西ありとあらゆる出会いが待っている。

ひと度ページをめくれば、時を超えた想いが、君を満たしてくれるだろう。
profile.CN:
（不知不觉）出现在新·迦勒底的伟大图书馆。
无论建立经过如何，其作为知识的宝库都是无可挑剔的，古今东西各种邂逅都在这里等待着。

每当翻过一页，跨越时光的情感都会令你心满意足吧。
profile.NA:
A great library (somehow) comes to be in Novum Chaldea.

Regardless of how it was established, it is perfect as a treasure trove of wisdom, waiting for all kinds of encounters at all times and places.


As you turn the pages one by one, you would surely be filled with emotions that transcended time.

profile.JP:
「ＮＦＦサービスを起こした理由？
　……そういえば口にしていませんでしたね。
　趣味と実益をかねた起業ではありますが、
　人類の皆さんを苦しめたいから設立した……
　というものではありません。
　このコヤンスカヤには、一つの夢があるのです」

それは彼女が唯一尊敬する、ある人間へのリスペクト。
人類で初めてグラビア雑誌を作り、
巨大市場で初めて服に商標権を設けた人物。
革新的な雑誌を作り、メディアの寵児になり、
多くの社会的批判を受けながら人種差別と戦った者。

「尊大、やり手、完璧主義。
　仕事にも性にも精力的だった風雲児。
　およそ娯楽と呼べるものすべてに成功した彼が、
　唯一、果たせなかった大事業―――
　それがカジノリゾートの建設でした。
　私はそのやり残しを残念に思い、
　ＮＦＦサービスを立ち上げたのです」

ディーラー服に身を包んだ妖艶な美女は語る。
自分の権能で都市を作るのは容易いこと。
しかし、それでは意味がない。
人間たちを享楽させる都市は、
人間たちのシステムの中で築かれてこそ。
成功も破産もコインの裏表。
その悲喜こもごもを味わうため、
惑星最大のカジノリゾートは開発された。
リボンにしか見えない巨大ビルは
その中心に建つ魂のシンボルなのである。

「とはいえ、お間違えのないように。
　人類の皆さんの欲望など、
　しょせん私の髪を飾る程度のもの。
　飽きてしまえば軽く摘まんで海に捨てるだけ。
　くれぐれも、愛されている―――
　などと、勘違いしないでくださいね？」
profile.CN:
「创办NFF服务的原因？
　……这么说来，我还没告诉过你吧。
　这虽然是兼顾了兴趣与利益的创业，
　但并不是为了……
　折磨各位人类而设立的。
　我高扬斯卡娅有个梦想。」

这是对她唯一尊敬的某个人类献上的敬意。
人类首个发明了写真杂志、
在巨大的市场首次开创了服饰商标权的人物。
创办了具有个性意义的杂志，成为了媒体的宠儿，
备受社会的批判，却为人种歧视而奋战之人。

「高傲、能干、完美主义。
　无论在工作上还是在私生活上都精力充沛的风云人物。
　在被称作娱乐的事业上获得全面成功的他，
　唯一没能实现的大事业——
　那就是建设度假区。
　我就是为这种未竟之事感到遗憾，
　才创立了NFF服务。」

身穿发牌员服装的妖艳美女如是说。
凭自己的权能，创造都市轻而易举。
但是，这样是没有意义的。
供人类享乐的都市，
就该在人类的系统中建立才行。
成功与破产都是硬币的两面。
为了细细品尝这种悲喜，
建立了全行星最大的赌场度假区。
看上去完全是个蝴蝶结的高楼大厦，
就是建立于度假区中心的灵魂地标。

「只不过，还请您不要误会。
　各位人类的欲望，
　也只配用来装饰我的头发罢了。
　一旦我用腻了，就会轻易摘下扔进海里。

profile.NA:
“......Speaking of which, I haven’t told you about why I started the NFF Services, have I?

It is an entrepreneurship that serves as both a source of income and my hobby, however, it is not something that I founded because I want to......torment all of humanity, no, it’s not.

This Koyanskaya has but a single dream!”


She has respect for a certain human, the only one that she reveres.

The first of mankind who made gravure magazine and one who established trademark rights in a gigantic market.

The one who fought against racism while making liberal magazine, becoming the media’s darling, and facing many criticisms from society.


“A pompous and skilled perfectionist.

A seeker of fortune who was energetic in both work and sex.

There was only one business that guy, who was successful in anything remotely related to entertainment, couldn’t achieve―――

It was a Casino Resort establishment.

That’s why I started NFF, with regards to that unfinished business.”


The bewitching beautiful woman wearing dealer clothing talks about how it is easy to build a city with her own authority.

However, that would make it meaningless.

It needs to be a city built in the humans’ system, to give humans pleasure.

Success and bankruptcy are two sides of the same coin.

The largest Casino Resort in this planet was developed so you could taste that mixture of joy and sorrow.

The huge building that looks like a ribbon is a symbol of that spirit.


“On that note, I hope you don’t misunderstand.

After all, the likes of all humanity’s desire are only worth as much as some decorations for my hair.

Once I lose interest in it, I would pick it up and throw it to the sea without a second thought.

Please don’t make the mistake of thinking that you are being loved sincerely―――or something, ok?”

profile.NA:
This is the tale of a certain faerie.


“The preparation has been finished a long time ago.

Let’s get to measuring right away.”


After a looong training, and an even looonger slumber.

The faerie met the bride she has been waiting for again, and she tried her best to stop her tears from spilling out.


“It’s time to stop wearing that iron armour.

Let me prepare the best dress for you.”


For the happiest future.

For the most important memory.

For this day, she will show off the skills she has been polishing.


Like that, the most wonderful time for the faerie is over.

The figure of the bride wearing her finished dress that she has been dreaming of so many times was finally happening.


The bride, looking as if covered by stars, was very happy and thanked the faerie for it.

With that single word, the faerie’s journey came to an end safely.



On that note.


“―――Hmm, good morning, Mashu.

I’m so glad.

Being told that makes me very happy.”


Unfortunately, after this, the girl came to sleep in the ice coffin.

The faerie wanted to be the first one to greet her when she woke up, and to tell her how she feels, earlier than anyone else.

profile.NA:
The Princess of the Autumn Forest fell in love.

She fell in love with a Prince who looked like he was born a corpse.


While her forest friends were being merry about the arrival of the Prince, she alone was gazing at him from afar.


Even after the Prince recovered, and she caught a glimpse of his heart, the Princess’ heart remained unchanged.


It was a hangout for discarded faeries.

While he laughed at them for being the low-class in the Faerie Kingdom, the Prince did not move his home from the Autumn Forest at all.


After doing good things, he would be meticulously washing his hands in the forest’s river.

After doing bad things, he would collapse onto the fallen leaves with his wings still dirtied.


The Prince loathed all of Britain.

He also loathed the faeries and the forest friends.

However,


“I'm no god.

Even those who disappear if you leave them alone are too much for me to handle.”


Knowing what the Prince really hated, the Princess, until the very end, kept the fact that she flapped her wings for his sake to herself.


It's because she believes he was the only fire that could warm her cold limbs.


　　　◆


This is a literary fragment that couldn’t be told.

The story of a proud Princess, hidden by a big liar.

fandomLink: A Pavane for the Deceased Princess

profile.JP:
―――かつて名もなき英霊が
振るったと言われる雌雄剣。

始まりはとても小さな火であったが、やがて炎となり、煉獄と呼ばれる強大な力を得た。そしてそれは長い戦いの中で、己を自覚し、人に似た意思のような何かを持つに至った。

なーんて偉そうな事を言ってはいるが、まあ、いわゆるしゃべる剣ってやつだな俺は。そんなに珍しい剣でもないさ。ちなみに実際の性能は合体している時のほうが上だぞ、本人が言うんだから間違いない。あくまで俺が独立行動形態の時に個々の戦闘スタイルを考慮して、雌雄剣として分かたれているだけに
過ぎないんだな、これが。
分かれている時は、主の力としての側面を短いほうの雄剣、技としての側面を長いほうの雌剣がつかさどっている。

本来は許されない、存在もしなかったかもしれないとても、とてもささやかな夏のひと時。

なに、あんだけひどい目にあったんだ。それくらいの奇跡は許されたっていいはずさ。


―――なあ、我が終生の主よ。

使用过的雌雄双剑。

起初只是一簇微小的火苗，随后化作火焰，获得了被称为炼狱的强大力量。然后在漫长的战斗中，意识到自我，并最终拥有了与人相似的意志般的存在。

说起来好像很了不起，但实际上，我就是所谓的会说话的剑啦。也不是什么稀罕的剑。顺便一提，实际性能方面是合体之后比较强哦，我本人都这么说了，肯定不会错。只不过我在独立行动形态时，会考虑到各种战斗风格，才会分成雌雄双剑的形式而已。
分开时，主人力量的那面由较短的雄剑司掌，而主人技巧的那面由较长的雌剑司掌。

这是原本是不被允许，也不可能存在的，非常，非常渺小的夏日一刻。

没什么，反正都吃了那么多苦头，这点奇迹应该能被允许吧。


——是吧，我终生的主人啊。
profile.NA:
―――A pair of male and female swords said to have been formerly wielded by a nameless Heroic Spirit.


It was once a small flame, however, before long, it has become a blaze, gaining a mighty strength and was called “Purgatory (Rengoku)”. And then, amidst the long battles, it became self-aware, and attained something that resembles a human's will.


Welllll, it sounds like I’m saying something snobbish here, but I am actually, how do you guys call it, a talking sword. Not that that kind of sword is rare though. By the way, the actual performance is superior when both swords are combined, since it’s said by the sword itself, it cannot be wrong. The pair of male and female swords are separated simply because I take into consideration the individual fighting style we have when we act independently.

When separated, the shorter male sword is in charge of strength, while the longer female sword is in charge of techniques.


It was a very tiny, insignificant moment of summer that shouldn’t have existed and shouldn't have been allowed to exist in the first place.


What, considering that we have been through so many horrible things, at least this kind of miracle should be allowed, you know?



―――Don't you agree, my life-long Master?

profile.JP:
旅は終わり、帰還して、荷物を片付けていく。
胸に刻まれた思い出以上のものはないけれど。
作ってもらったぬいぐるみを見る度に、

次に夏の特異点を想起する。

騒々しくて、けたたましく、汗水を流して大声で笑い、
走って、転んで、また走って、ぐるぐる巡って迷って。

喜びも怒りも哀しみも楽しさも、全てが詰まったもの。
他の誰にも存在しない、私だけの物語。

煌めいて輝く星空を仲間と共に見た。
透き通る青空を仲間と共に見た。
精緻に思い出すことはできなくとも、
美しいものを私たちは確かに共有したのだ。

そして私は、片付いたような片付いてないような
荷物を前にして。

profile.CN:

吵吵闹闹，慌慌张张，流着汗水，大声欢笑，

光用快乐这个词无法描述，

没有其他任何人的，只属于我的故事。

与同伴们一起仰望过耀眼的星空。
与同伴们一起欣赏过通透的蓝天。
就算没有什么精致的回忆，
我们也确实共享着美丽的东西。

而我，站在仿佛已经收拾好但又仿佛没收拾的行李前。
低声呢喃了一句「好」。
profile.NA:
I put away my luggage after returning from the trip.

While there is nothing that can compare with the memories engraved in my heart, each time I look at the stuff animals they made for me, I would remember our parting, which was filled with tenderness, and then, I would recall that Summer Singularity.


It was boisterous, it was wild, we sweated, we laughed loudly, we ran, we fell, and then we ran again, we went around and around, and we got lost.

"Fun" is not the word to describe it, and "super" is not enough to explain it either.

Joy, anger, sorrow, and enjoyment, they are all packed in there.

It was a story that exists only for me and no one else.


I watched the glittering and sparkling starry sky with my friends.

And I watched the clear blue sky with them too.

Even if I cannot recall the details, we have definitely shared something beautiful with each other.


Standing in front of my luggage that looks like it has been tidied up in a way that looks like it hasn't been tidied up at all, I muttered one word, “Alrighty”.

profile.NA:

The withered grass holds its breath, the birds stop spreading their wings, and the sun forgets to go down.


So that they don’t miss even the sound of the snow-like girl moving.

profile.JP:
舞台上で万雷の喝采を受ける者。

舞台袖へ密やかに“はける”者。

かくも素晴らしき、

profile.CN:
在舞台上获得雷鸣般喝彩之人。

悄悄“退居”舞台侧面之人。

profile.NA:
They receive thunderous applause on stage.

However, in the end, they are only pitiful shadow figures who are called actors.


A person quietly exits into the side curtains.

Yet they are the one and only shadow figure that absolutely cannot be replaced.


When all is said and done, they are the same.


Men, women, the young, and the old, everyone is equal as they are given birth into a theatre (world) from the sea of imagination―――


Let us be the star in this very wonderful and momentous dream!

profile.JP:

profile.CN:

profile.NA:

profile.JP:
これが、私だ。

下卑た黄金の輝き。
自由という言葉と相反する枷。
重い鎖は耳障りな音で嘲弄を導く。
誰が見ても敗北者だとわかるような。
この人間は間違いを犯した愚者で、
だからこそこうなっているのだと、
見る者全てに理解されるような―――
恥辱の証。

だが、今、私たちはこれを見ている。
外れたものを、外から。

輝きはただの輝きで。
枷が遮る自由はなく。
重みは砂漠の砂の上。

だから、もう一度言うよ。

―――これが、私だ。
profile.CN:
这，才是我。

低劣的黄金光辉。
与自由这个词截然相反的枷锁。
沉重的锁链用刺耳的声音引来嘲弄。
仿佛为了让任何人都知道这就是败者。
用来为了让所有人都明白，
这个人是犯了过错的愚者，
所以才会变成这副样子的——
耻辱的证明。

但是，现在，我们正看着这个。
从外侧，看着被卸下的东西。

光辉就是普通的光辉。
没有用枷锁遮盖的自由。
沉重放在沙漠砂砾之上。

所以，我要重申一遍。

——这，才是我。
profile.NA:
This is me.


A golden radiance that has become vulgar.

The shackles that contradict the word "freedom".

The heavy chains that invite ridicule with its ear-grating sound.

It makes me feel like anyone who looks at me can understand that I am the defeated.

It makes me feel like everyone who looks at me can understand that this person was a fool who made a blunder, that was why she ended up this way―――A proof of my shame.


However, as we are looking at it now. 

Looking at it from the outside, removed from me.


Its radiance is simply that, a radiance.

It is not the freedom obstructed by the shackles.

Its weight resting on the desert sand.


That’s why, I will say this once again.


―――This is, me.

profile.JP:
きらきら輝くガラスの靴も、

訳じゃないの。これは本気の、勝負どころでないと、
履いちゃダメってことね。

私（アタシ）の勝負どころはいつ？

つまり、ほとんど毎日ってことね！

よーし、休んでいるところ悪いけれど、
ガラスの靴、装備！　カボチャ馬車、用意！
さあ、今日も明日も張り切って唄うわよーーー！
profile.CN:
闪闪发光的玻璃鞋、
勇猛奔驰的南瓜马车、
无法飞行的普通扫帚，
现在全都休息、休息。

灰姑娘也不是一直穿着玻璃鞋的。
若非动真格决胜负的时候，是不能穿的哦。

我决胜负的时刻是何时？
那当然，是歌唱的日子……
也就是说，几乎是每一天！

好～，抱歉在休息时打扰你，
但玻璃鞋，装备！　南瓜马车，准备！
来吧，无论今明，都要振作精神歌唱哦～～～！
profile.NA:
The glass slippers that sparkle and glitter, the pumpkin carriage that runs valiantly and earnestly, and the normal broom that cannot fly, they are all taking a break, a brief respite.


Even Cinderella doesn't have her glass slippers on all the time, you know. I'm being serious here, one shouldn't wear them unless it's a decisive moment.


What is my decisive moment?

Isn't it obvious, it's the days I sing......

In other words, it's almost every day!


Alrighty, I feel bad for interrupting your rest, but glass slippers, equip!

Pumpkin carriage, get ready!

Now then, I'm gonna pump myself up and sing, today, and tomorrow, tooーーー!

profile.CN:
